reason.title: Motivo de consulta:
reason.description: Paciente varon de 45 años refiere sentir dolor en la region abdominal tras ingerir macarrones con queso hace 2 horas.

description.title: Descripción:
description.description: Paciente presenta diarrea acuosa y frecuente (más de 3 deposiciones líquidas al día) acompañada de dolor abdominal y calambres. Se observa fiebre de 38.5°C y signos de deshidratación moderada. Antecedente de uso reciente de antibióticos (clindamicina).

diagnosis.title: Diagnostico
diagnosis.description: Colitis seudomembranosa secundaria a infección por Clostridioides difficile.

reason.title: Reason for consultation:
reason.description: A 45-year-old male patient reports feeling pain in the abdominal region after eating macaroni and cheese 2 hours ago.

description.title: Description:
description.description: Patient presents with frequent, watery diarrhea (more than 3 liquid stools per day) accompanied by abdominal pain and cramps. Fever of 38.5°C and signs of moderate dehydration are observed. History of recent use of antibiotics (clindamycin).

diagnosis.title: Diagnosis
diagnosis.description: Pseudomembranous colitis secondary to Clostridioides difficile infection.

trafficker.title: Trafficker:
trafficker.name: First and last name: Juanito Alimaña
